category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 9 (quorum, etc.)
contents: Article 9 (Quorum, etc.) Except as otherwise specifically provided in these regulations, the Committee shall open with the attendance of a majority of registered members, and matters to be determined as opinions of the Committee shall be decided with the approval of a majority of members present. Revised 2019. 1. 31. [Title revised 2019. 1. 31.]
